Articles.Content: Im not really sure this should be here. If this doesn't belong here, moderators please move to correct position. I am looking for a mod to start a new division for my rocket building company on. You can enter your answer in the poll above, or post it below. My only restriction is that the mod has to be out for ksp version 0.22 or 0.21. Thanks to all show share their answer.
I can't see why you can't use more than one at the same tame (provided you don't have memory issues)

I can't see why you can't use more than one at the same tame (provided you don't have memory issues)

Im starting up an actual "modded" division. Im just going to start adding one mod to use at a time though.
FAR. Also just about any of the mods in my sig. Just not RSS, that makes the game a bit too hard

If you had to pick ONE, then FAR is a must. But why would you stop at one, when there are soo many mods out there that has near necessary features, like the information provided by Mechjeb2 (I don't personally use the auto pilot though)
KW rocketry, Remote Tech, TAC life support and Deadly Reentry are awesome mods.
